class.name: com.cardiodx.db.waban.audit.AudChecklistComment
class.comment: Audit of comments that are recorded while performing procedures on samples.

column.name: CHANGE_REASON_ID
column.comment: Foreign key to the reason for change in change_reason table

column.name: CHECKLIST_CONTENT_ID
column.comment: Identifies the result the comment is attached to. Part of the primary key and a foreign key to the CHECKLIST_CONTENT table.

column.name: COMMENTS
column.comment: Text comments about the step involved.

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.comment: User who created this record. Part of the primary key.

column.name: DATE_CREATED
column.comment: Date this record was created. Part of the primary key.

column.name: CHANGED_BY
column.comment: User who caused this audit transaction to take place.

column.name: DATE_CHANGED
column.comment: Date this audit transaction took place.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Activity that triggered this audit transaction (mod or del).
